results.content: This course didn't met my expectations at all. The course is poorly designed. The "Hands on coding" part is not intresting. The FAQ part is not at all required. I didn't find course as useful as I expected.

response.content: We are sorry to learn that you didn't like the course. We are gonna make another comprehensive course on Java. Hope, you'll like that!
